comments_additional.author: ManiAdhav
comments_additional.body:
Hey, I am searching for blog writing AI assistance for the last one week for my SaaS and finalized FlipAEO two days before.

Your tool looks interesting, but a few things make me rethink trying it.

Your site didn't provide confidence or clarity to attempt because it looks completely AI written and unable to catch the USP.

I finalized the tool after 2 days of continuous discussion with Gemini and ChatGPT. My prompt always intended to find startup-friendly and low-budget tools. Even your tool met the metrics and still was not visible in the AI search.

When you think about conversion, I suggest reviewing your website and also building trust with results.

I am also a founder like you and sharing this from a user perspective.

replies.author: surajondev
replies.body:
Thanks Mani for your valuable feedback. I just launched the tool 2 weeks ago, which affects not getting citation as of now. Regarding your feedback:

Yes, I have used AI to build the landing page. Your point is valid as it looks generic. I realized this last week too. I think I need to work on the UI to avoid looking generic.

Results are harder to get. It will require running for a few months to see actual results.

Also, I checked FlipAEO too. Unlike them, we are not a mass AI content generator as humans are still involved in our platform. We provide research, integration, and analysis tools to write citation-friendly content.

If you ever feel like trying the platform, please do it. It has a free tier too.
